Get a quote Help Manage booking Flights Holidays Hotels Cruises Tours Car Hire Deals More Flights Holidays Hotels Cruises Tours Car Hire Deals More Get a quote Stores 0800 456 595 Tours Tours European Discovery Share EXCLUSIVE SAVE $2300* per person Tours Tours European Discovery Share European Discovery Deal number: 21932507 INSIGHT VACATIONS This deal expires 14 Nov 2025 31-Jul-26 Europe 17-day tour Price from $ 9,859 * per person Enquire to book Call 0800 456 595 Deal number: 21932507 Call 0800 456 595 Enquire to book Packed with value: EXCLUSIVE SAVE $2300* per person 17-day tour departing Amsterdam 16-nights accommodation in handpicked 4 & 5 star hotels in great locations PLUS, add international flights & comprehensive Travel Insurance and SAVE $500* per booking in-store with Bundle + Save^ Superior dining in top rated restaurants Daily breakfasts & many relaxed morning starts after 9am 24/7 personal service - knowledgeable Travel Director & expert Driver ‘Business Class’ style coaches with extended legroom Insider Access, Insightful Encounters and Insight Choice experiences Local discovery led by Local Experts Porterage, plus tips and gratuities at hotels and restaurants, is included Airfares & transfers are additional Itinerary From Amsterdam to Rome and onto Paris, this grand tour takes in Cinque Terre, abundant Florence sightseeing and a delectable Lucerne Dine Around evening. Start your tour with a curated cruise through the canals led by local experts—the perfect introduction to the Netherlands. Onwards in style into Germany, the Rhine's UNESCO world heritage sites give way to the golden city of Prague—where your local guide will lead you through the hilltop castle courtyards and the grandiose St Vitus Cathedral or through the Jewish Quarter. A tour of Italy serves up the gondola-filled canals of Venice and the opulence of Rome, before Swiss delights beckon in Lucerne. Paris dazzles last with a chance to shop the city's boutiques like a local and enjoy views of iconic sights, including Notre-Dame and the Louvre. Show more Day 1 Welcome to Amsterdam Spend the day at leisure before joining your Travel Director in the evening. Cruise the city’s charming, tree-lined canals and explore the heart of the Old City, then share a delightful dinner with your fellow travellers at a local restaurant. Day 2 Amsterdam If you choose, you could start the morning by visiting the Van Loon Museum. Later, visit the newly refurbished Rijksmuseum with a Local Expert, Amsterdam's famed treasure trove of Dutch art, housing Rembrandt's ‘Night Watch.’ Day 3 Legends along the Rhine Cross into Germany, through the Rhine Valley and into Würzburg, where there is time to stroll through the heart of the Old Town and down to the Alte Mainbrücke, the 16th century bridge over the River Main, adorned with sandstone statues. With a Local Expert, visit the imposing Würzburg Residenz, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Marvel at intricate decorations and lavish staterooms boasting with French, Austrian and Venetian influences. Day 4 Rothenburg and Golden Prague Venture to Rothenburg ob der Tauber, the most well-preserved town on the Romantic Road. Continue east to the Czech border, passing the town of Pilsen, renowned for its beer, before arriving in the Golden City of Prague. In the evening, perhaps enjoy a river cruise through the heart of the city. Day 5 Prague, City of a Hundred Spires Explore Prague with Insight Choice. Choose to walk the courtyards of the Castle and visit the imposing St. Vitus Cathedral. Alternatively, join your Local Expert through the Jewish Quarter and hear about the history, traditions and legends of the Jewish people and taste Trdelník, a traditional Czech pastry. In the afternoon, see the mighty Marienburg Fortress - the immense baroque palace of the Prince Bishops and one of the most important landmarks in Germany. Then, the city is all yours to explore. Day 6 Salzburg, City of Mozart Journey through the Czech Republic and continue south over the Austrian border and onto Salzburg, the city of Mozart and the ‘Sound of Music.’ A Local Expert shows you the formal gardens of Mirabell Palace which includes the fountains and statues where the 'Do, Re, Mi' scene was filmed. Later see Residence Square and its fountain, where Maria sings 'I Have Confidence'. Witness the imposing fortress, immense cathedral and Mozart’s birthplace on the lively Getreidegasse. In the evening, experience authentic Farm-to-Table dining at a restaurant in Salzburg and enjoy the flavours of homemade dishes. Day 7 The Tauern Mountains to Venice Enjoy a leisurely morning in Salzburg to shop for local marzipan specialities. Perhaps take the opportunity to marvel at impressive views atop Kehlsteinhaus - the Eagle’s Nest. Later, stunning scenery surrounds you as you travel down the Tauern Mountains to cross the Italian border. Continue to the romantic city of Venice, Queen of the Adriatic. Day 8 The Magic of 'La Serenissima' See the immense Campanile and Doge's Palace on St. Mark's Square, connected to the ancient prisons by the Bridge of Sighs. Join a MAKE TRAVEL MATTER® Experience as you witness the skill of glassblowers on a visit to a traditional arts centre. The rest of the day is at leisure. Perhaps shop in the small arcades or cruise the Venetian lagoon to the island of Burano for a meal of local specialities and wine? Day 9 On to the Eternal City of Rome Head into the Apennine Mountains and the peaceful landscapes of Tuscany and Umbria. Your journey continues as you follow the course of the Tiber to the Eternal City of Rome. Day 10 Rome with the Locals Rome is about art, antiquity, piazzas and palaces, and your morning walking tour with a Local Expert includes this in abundance. Toss a coin into the spectacular Trevi Fountain and see the best-preserved monument from the Roman period - the Pantheon, before enjoying free time to do as the Romans do, in Piazza Navona. In the evening, enjoy a private visit to the Basilica of Saint Praxedes, welcomed by the Rector of the basilica. Admire the stunning 9th-century Byzantine mosaics illuminated for this exclusive visit as you view the legendary well and renowned chapels. Day 11 The Vatican and Florence Your Local Expert will introduce you to the grandeur of the city, starting with the Vatican State. Visit the Vatican Museums, full of priceless treasures collected by the Popes. Once inside the Sistine Chapel, admire Michelangelo's famous ceiling. Continue to Florence where a Local Expert will accompany you to the Duomo, the Gates of Paradise, and Piazza della Signoria, the political heart of the city. Day 12 The Cinque Terre The famous Italian Riviera and the Cinque Terre are a highlight of your journey. Explore this UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of Italy’s most beautiful landscapes. With a Local Expert, approach one of the picturesque fishing villages by boat (weather permitting). Spend time exploring the old medieval quarter or the sandy beach. Continue on to Santa Margherita Ligure. Day 13 Across the Alps to Lucerne Pass Milan and Lake Lugano before continuing into the Swiss Alps through the Saint Gotthard Tunnel. Travel alongside towering mountains and past rushing torrents, down to scenic Lake Lucerne, where you have leisure time for the rest of the afternoon. Day 14 Lucerne’s Lakes and Mountains Explore Mount Stanserhorn on a MAKE TRAVEL MATTER® Experience, ascending by open-top cable car. On a clear day, take in views as far as Alsace and the Black Forest. Walk scenic mountain pathways, with the chance to hear a conservation talk by a Swiss ranger. Back in Lucerne, see the Lion Monument, Chapel Bridge, and Jesuit church. The rest of the day is at leisure before a Dine-Around Evening. Show full itinerary Enquire to book this trip Deal number: 21932507 European Discovery INSIGHT VACATIONS 31-Jul-26 Europe 17-day tour Tell us about your plans What else are you interested in?
